name: Seals Adventurer Sprayskirt
description: This coated nylon touring sprayskirt has rim-grip / safety-slip technology that seals well even against the smoothest cockpit rims. Available in a full range of sizes to fit it to your boat.Made of coated nylon packcloth.Tensioned stay peaks at the front deck to prevent pooling.Comfortable waistband.Removable shoulder straps.Double-stitched and sealed seams.To find the right size for your boat, please visit http://www.sealsskirts.com/sizing/sizing.php
